abstract: Activist investor Carl C. Icahn made another power play for Biogen Idec Friday, as the company said its fourth-quarter profit edged up 3 percent and 2009 results could top expectations.
lead_paragraph: Activist investor Carl C. Icahn made another power play for Biogen Idec Friday, as the company said its fourth-quarter profit edged up 3 percent and 2009 results could top expectations.

headline.main: Biogen Posts Higher Profit and Icahn Makes a Move
